text:
Maybe sticking to nearby places is better...
Going far would take up a lot of time...

We were discussing what to do on our next day off...
I feel like it's a great opportunity, so I'm hesitating.

How about taking it easy with some shopping?
We might learn more about each other's tastes.

In that case... There's a shop
I want to go to with Meguru and you...

Wasn't it... a late night at work the day before?
How about the three of us have a sleepover afterward?

That's a great idea, Producer!
During a sleepover, we can talk even more than usual!

Actually, I just got some invitation tickets
How about the three of us use them?

Really...!? Thank you so much!
I'll start planning right away!
